mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.self_num AS "selfNum", a.vehicle_num AS "vehicleNum", a.operator AS "operator", a.first_quarter AS "firstQuarter", a.second_quarter AS "secondQuarter", a.third_quarter AS "thirdQuarter", a.fourth_quarter AS "fourthQuarter", a.inspection_time AS "inspectionTime", a.mark AS "mark", a.driver_license AS "driverLicense", a.query_code AS "queryCode"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO z_maintenance_record( id, create_by, update_by, del_flag, create_date, update_date, remarks, self_num, vehicle_num, operator, first_quarter, second_quarter, third_quarter, fourth_quarter, inspection_time, mark, driver_license, query_code ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateBy.id}, #{delFlag}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{selfNum}, #{vehicleNum}, #{operator}, #{firstQuarter}, #{secondQuarter}, #{thirdQuarter}, #{fourthQuarter}, #{inspectionTime}, #{mark}, #{driverLicense}, #{queryCode} )
mapper.update: UPDATE z_maintenance_record SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, self_num = #{selfNum}, vehicle_num = #{vehicleNum}, operator = #{operator}, first_quarter = #{firstQuarter}, second_quarter = #{secondQuarter}, third_quarter = #{thirdQuarter}, fourth_quarter = #{fourthQuarter}, inspection_time = #{inspectionTime}, mark = #{mark}, driver_license = #{driverLicense}, query_code = #{queryCode} WHERE id = #{id}
